verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> As <S%H5492>whirlwinds<s%> in the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H2498>pass<s%> through; so it <S%H935>comes<s%> from the <S%H4057>desert,<s%> from a <S%H3372>terrible<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

A <S%H7186>grievous<s%> <S%H2380>vision<s%> is <S%H5046>declared<s%> to me; the <S%H898>treacherous<s%> dealer <S%H6213>deals<s%> <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and the <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> <S%H7703>spoils.<s%> <S%H5927>Go<s%> up, O <S%H5867>Elam:<s%> <S%H6696>besiege,<s%> O <S%H4074>Media;<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H585>sighing<s%> thereof have I made to <S%H7673>cease.<s%>

<S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> are my <S%H4975>loins<s%> <S%H4390>filled<s%> with <S%H2479>pain:<s%> <S%H6735>pangs<s%> have <S%H270>taken<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> on me, as the <S%H6735>pangs<s%> of a woman that <S%H3205>travails:<s%> I was <S%H5791>bowed<s%> down at the <S%H8085>hearing<s%> of it; I was <S%H926>dismayed<s%> at the <S%H7200>seeing<s%> of it.

My <S%H3824>heart<s%> <S%H8582>panted,<s%> <S%H6427>fearfulness<s%> <S%H1204>affrighted<s%> me: the <S%H5399>night<s%> of my <S%H2837>pleasure<s%> has he <S%H7760>turned<s%> into <S%H2731>fear<s%> to me.

<S%H6186>Prepare<s%> the <S%H7979>table,<s%> <S%H6822>watch<s%> in the <S%H6844>watchtower,<s%> <S%H398>eat,<s%> <S%H8354>drink:<s%> <S%H6965>arise,<s%> you <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H4886>anoint<s%> the <S%H4043>shield.<s%>
For <S%H3541>thus<s%> has the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H3212>Go,<s%> <S%H5975>set<s%> a <S%H6822>watchman,<s%> let him <S%H5046>declare<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> he <S%H7200>sees.<s%>

And he <S%H7200>saw<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen,<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H2543>asses,<s%> and a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H1581>camels;<s%> and he <S%H7181>listened<s%> <S%H7182>diligently<s%> with <S%H7227>much<s%> <S%H7182>heed:<s%>

And he <S%H7121>cried,<s%> A <S%H738>lion:<s%> My <S%H136>lord,<s%> I <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H8548>continually<s%> on the <S%H4707>watchtower<s%> in the <S%H3119>daytime,<s%> and I am <S%H5324>set<s%> in my <S%H4931>ward<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H3915>nights:<s%>

And, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H2088>here<s%> <S%H935>comes<s%> a <S%H7393>chariot<s%> of <S%H376>men,<s%> with a <S%H6776>couple<s%> of <S%H6571>horsemen.<s%> And he <S%H6030>answered<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H894>Babylon<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen,<s%> is <S%H5307>fallen;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6456>graven<s%> images of her <S%H430>gods<s%> he has <S%H7665>broken<s%> to the <S%H776>ground.<s%>

O my <S%H4098>threshing,<s%> and the <S%H1121>corn<s%> of my <S%H1637>floor:<s%> that <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H8085>heard<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> have I <S%H5046>declared<s%> to you.

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of <S%H1746>Dumah.<s%> He <S%H7121>calls<s%> to me out of <S%H8165>Seir,<s%> <S%H8104>Watchman,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> of the <S%H3915>night?<s%> <S%H8104>Watchman,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> of the <S%H3915>night?<s%>

The <S%H8104>watchman<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H857>comes,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> the <S%H3915>night:<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you will <S%H1158>inquire,<s%> <S%H1158>inquire<s%> you: <S%H7725>return,<s%> <S%H857>come.<s%>

The <S%H4853>burden<s%> on <S%H6152>Arabia.<s%> In the <S%H3293>forest<s%> in <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> shall you <S%H3885>lodge,<s%> O you <S%H736>traveling<s%> <S%H736>companies<s%> of <S%H1720>Dedanim.<s%>

The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8485>Tema<s%> <S%H857>brought<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> to him that was <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> they <S%H6923>prevented<s%> with their <S%H3899>bread<s%> him that <S%H5074>fled.<s%>

For they <S%H5074>fled<s%> from the <S%H2719>swords,<s%> from the <S%H5203>drawn<s%> <S%H2719>sword,<s%> and from the <S%H1869>bent<s%> <S%H7198>bow,<s%> and from the <S%H3514>grievousness<s%> of <S%H4421>war.<s%>

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> has the <S%H136>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H5750>Within<s%> a <S%H8141>year,<s%> according to the <S%H8141>years<s%> of an <S%H7916>hireling,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar<s%> shall <S%H3615>fail:<s%>

And the <S%H7605>residue<s%> of the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7198>archers,<s%> the <S%H1368>mighty<s%> men of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> shall be <S%H4591>diminished:<s%> for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it.
